title: Was It WORTH Taking?
body_text:
RISK Results ... and Then Some!
A new year. A new month. A new war. With an overwhelming 67% in "Secret Selection 124",
EastCoastDodgeball
welcomed
RiskBall
, a four team
BoxBall
variation where participants had the rare opportunity to conquer territory and capture enemies!
Flash Results by Game (Risk)
:
ARMY 1 wins
A1: 1, 2
A2: 4
A3: (0)
A4: 3
Following the "risky" hour-long massacre, armies joined forces for indeed a classic war fought for glory and pride. The triumphant ARMY 1 combined its resources with the winless ARMY 3 in an effort to seize victory away from double-up ARMY 2 and 4.
The rules may have been slightly modified from the preceding onslaught, but the level of intensity and brutalization remained at an all-time high.
Flash Results by Game (Classic)
:
ARMY 24 wins 4 to 1
A13: 8
A24: 5, 6, 7, 9
Moments & Stars
: Kevin Megill throwing a bulletball in between the arms of the crutches; Mike Edwards's no-look backward throw on Bob Cornero;
RECORDS
> Attendance: 20
> New Players: (1) Katie Mottley
- DODGEBALL 124's "Secret Selection" voting brought along the debut of
RiskBall
, a four team variation of
BoxBall Dodgeball
. After four rounds of
Risk
, armies combined in a classic two team melee.
- Army 1 defeated Army 2, Army 4, and Army 3 by a score of 2-1-1-0.
- For the classic portion of the evening, combined Army 24 defeated Army 13, 4 - 1.
.. "Secret Selection" Results:
Classic Two Team (11%) -- Two Team PrisonBall (0%) -- Two Team BoxBall (22%) -- Four Team Risk (67%)
You're just one of many pacing back and forth, nervously awaiting the announcement of the colossal Season 13 midway showdown. Time is indeed your worst enemy especially in this case as that shocking revelation will come sometime in the next 48 hours,
but
, only if you're on the
EastCoastDodgeball
Text Messaging Service!
For those impatient people, try unscrambling this tiny hint, courtesy "The Writer":
a l r a s i e m t r c o e n u
body_html:
RISK Results ... and Then Some!
A new year. A new month. A new war. With an overwhelming 67% in "Secret Selection 124", EastCoastDodgeball welcomed RiskBall, a four team BoxBall variation where participants had the rare opportunity to conquer territory and capture enemies!

Flash Results by Game (Risk): ARMY 1 wins
A1: 1, 2
A2: 4
A3: (0)
A4: 3

Following the "risky" hour-long massacre, armies joined forces for indeed a classic war fought for glory and pride. The triumphant ARMY 1 combined its resources with the winless ARMY 3 in an effort to seize victory away from double-up ARMY 2 and 4.

The rules may have been slightly modified from the preceding onslaught, but the level of intensity and brutalization remained at an all-time high.

Flash Results by Game (Classic): ARMY 24 wins 4 to 1
A13: 8
A24: 5, 6, 7, 9

Moments & Stars: Kevin Megill throwing a bulletball in between the arms of the crutches; Mike Edwards's no-look backward throw on Bob Cornero;

RECORDS
> Attendance: 20
> New Players: (1) Katie Mottley

- DODGEBALL 124's "Secret Selection" voting brought along the debut of RiskBall, a four team variation of BoxBall Dodgeball. After four rounds of Risk, armies combined in a classic two team melee.
- Army 1 defeated Army 2, Army 4, and Army 3 by a score of 2-1-1-0.
- For the classic portion of the evening, combined Army 24 defeated Army 13, 4 - 1.

.. "Secret Selection" Results:
Classic Two Team (11%) -- Two Team PrisonBall (0%) -- Two Team BoxBall (22%) -- Four Team Risk (67%)


You're just one of many pacing back and forth, nervously awaiting the announcement of the colossal Season 13 midway showdown. Time is indeed your worst enemy especially in this case as that shocking revelation will come sometime in the next 48 hours, but, only if you're on the EastCoastDodgeball Text Messaging Service!

For those impatient people, try unscrambling this tiny hint, courtesy "The Writer":
a l r a s i e m t r c o e n u
